text: Mother () is a 1926 Soviet silent drama movie directed by Vsevolod Pudovkin.Киностудия им. Горького разместит в YouTube более 500 фильмовНа YouTube-канале Киностудии им. Горького разместят более 500 фильмов It stars Vera Baranovskaya, Nikolai Batalov, and Aleksandr Chistyakov. ==Actors== * Vera Baranovskaya as Pelageya Nilovna Vlasova, the Mother * Nikolai Batalov as Pavel Vlasov, the Son * Aleksandr Chistyakov as Vlasov, the Father * Anna Zemtsova as Anna, a Revolutionary Girl * Ivan Koval-Samborsky as Vessovchtchnikov, Pavel's Friend * Vsevolod Pudovkin as Police Officer * V. Savitsky as Isaik Gorbov, the Foreman == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet silent movies Category:1926 movies
title: Mother (1926 movie)
